Key Match Events: Bronny James had a chase-down block in his Los Angeles Lakers debut.
Bronny James finished with two points on 1-for-6 shooting in the Lakers' 124-107 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Bronny James led the team with three blocked shots in 16 minutes while adding one rebound and one assist.
Bronny James' first block came less than a minute into his first shift to start the second quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Lakers coach JJ Redick said James earned the rotation minutes after a strong showing in the first week of training camp.
Redick focused on James' defensive impact that was already apparent.
Redick mentioned that Bronny James is easy to coach and has a great energy about him.
